leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 神经科学-电生理与神经信号生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→事件/分选→解码→实时→评测
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 实时系统 + 分析库 + GUI

tools.name: AllenInstitute/ecephys_spike_sorting
tools.one_line_profile: Modules for processing extracellular electrophysiology data from Neuropixels probes
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python modules developed by the Allen Institute for processing extracellular electrophysiology data, specifically designed for Neuropixels probes. It includes functionality for spike sorting, noise removal, and data preprocessing.

tools.name: aind-ephys-spikesort-kilosort25-full
tools.one_line_profile: CodeOcean capsule for full electrophysiology analysis pipeline using Kilosort2.5
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible analysis pipeline encapsulated for CodeOcean, utilizing Kilosort2.5 via SpikeInterface for processing electrophysiology data. Developed by Allen Neural Dynamics.

tools.name: lussac
tools.one_line_profile: Automated post-processing and merging of multiple spike-sorting analyses
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to automate the post-processing and merging of results from multiple spike-sorting runs, helping to consolidate and refine sorted units.

tools.name: JRCLUST
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable spike sorting framework with GPU acceleration and GUI
tools.detailed_description: A scalable, GPU-accelerated spike sorting framework that includes a graphical user interface for manual curation and visualization of large-scale extracellular recordings.

tools.name: bombcell
tools.one_line_profile: Automated quality control and curation of spike-sorted electrophysiology data
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for automated quality control and curation of spike-sorted data, capable of classifying neurons and removing noise artifacts. Available in MATLAB and Python.

tools.name: SpikeAgent
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal LLM-based AI agent for automating spike sorting pipelines
tools.detailed_description: An AI agent powered by Large Language Models designed to automate, standardize, and assist in the spike sorting pipeline, handling tasks from parameter tuning to quality inspection.

tools.name: spyglass
tools.one_line_profile: Neuroscience data analysis framework for reproducible research
tools.detailed_description: A data analysis framework built on Neurodata Without Borders (NWB) and DataJoint, designed to facilitate reproducible research and complex analysis pipelines in neuroscience.

tools.name: Kilosort
tools.one_line_profile: Fast spike sorting algorithm with drift correction
tools.detailed_description: A widely used, high-performance spike sorting software that implements template matching and drift correction, particularly optimized for high-density probes like Neuropixels.

tools.name: OpenElectrophy
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for analysis of intra- and extra-cellular recordings
tools.detailed_description: A legacy framework and database for storing and analyzing intra- and extra-cellular electrophysiological recordings, including tools for spike sorting and oscillation detection.

tools.name: SpikeInterface
tools.one_line_profile: Unified Python framework for spike sorting pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python framework that provides a unified interface to run, compare, and benchmark various spike sorting algorithms, along with tools for pre-processing and post-processing.

tools.name: spikeinterface-gui
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for SpikeInterface objects
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for visualizing and interacting with SpikeInterface objects, allowing for inspection of sorting results and data.

tools.name: spikely
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for running popular spike sorting algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A graphical interface built on top of SpikeInterface to facilitate the execution of various spike sorting algorithms without writing code.

tools.name: spikesorters
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper modules for external spike sorters in SpikeInterface
tools.detailed_description: A Python module containing wrappers for various external spike sorting algorithms, allowing them to be run through a common API. (Note: Functionality largely integrated into main SpikeInterface package in newer versions).

tools.name: spiketoolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for pre/post-processing and validation in SpikeInterface
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit providing preprocessing, postprocessing, validation, and curation modules for spike sorting pipelines. (Note: Functionality largely integrated into main SpikeInterface package in newer versions).

tools.name: SWR-Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB suite for analyzing Sharp Wave Ripples and other neurophysiological events
tools.detailed_description: A suite of MATLAB algorithms and GUI for the analysis and coincidence detection of local field sharp wave ripples (SWRs), oscillations (theta, gamma), spikes, and post-synaptic currents.

tools.name: MClust
tools.one_line_profile: Classic MATLAB-based spike sorting toolbox for tetrode recordings
tools.detailed_description: MClust is a Matlab-based spike sorting toolbox designed for the separation of putative cells from multi-site neurophysiological recordings, particularly optimized for tetrodes.

tools.name: MoKSM
tools.one_line_profile: Mixture of Kalman filter models for spike sorting
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Mixture of Kalman filter model for spike sorting, utilizing split & merge Expectation-Maximization algorithms.

tools.name: validspike
tools.one_line_profile: Spike sorting validation metrics and tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB and C codes for spike sorting validation and quality metric calculation, developed by the Flatiron Institute.

tools.name: UnitRefine
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning toolbox for automated spike sorting curation
tools.detailed_description: UnitRefine is a machine-learning based toolbox designed to simplify and automate the curation process of spike sorting results, reducing the need for manual intervention.

tools.name: KIASORT
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-Integrated Automated Spike Sorting
tools.detailed_description: KIASORT is an automated spike sorting tool that integrates knowledge for geometry-free neuron tracking.

tools.name: SpikeSort
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for spike sorting
tools.detailed_description: A spike sorting library implemented in Python using NumPy and PyTables for handling large datasets.

tools.name: roiextractors
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for extracting ROIs from optical imaging data
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based module for extracting, converting, and handling optical imaging data (e.g., calcium imaging) from various file formats, inspired by SpikeInterface.

tools.name: spikefinder
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking challenge and tools for spike detection in imaging
tools.detailed_description: Code and tools associated with the SpikeFinder benchmarking challenge for evaluating spike detection algorithms in calcium imaging data.

tools.name: KiloSort
tools.one_line_profile: State-of-the-art GPU-accelerated spike sorting software
tools.detailed_description: KiloSort is a widely used GPU-accelerated spike sorting software designed for high-density electrode arrays (e.g., Neuropixels).

tools.name: phy
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization and manual curation for spike sorting
tools.detailed_description: Phy provides a graphical user interface for the interactive visualization and manual curation of large-scale electrophysiological data sorted by KiloSort or similar tools.

tools.name: sortingQuality
tools.one_line_profile: Quality metrics for spike sorting results
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB functions to assess the quality of spike sorting results, often used in conjunction with KiloSort.

tools.name: wave_clus
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised spike detection and sorting using wavelets
tools.detailed_description: A fast and unsupervised algorithm for spike detection and sorting that uses wavelets and super-paramagnetic clustering.

tools.name: UltraMegaSort2000
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for spike sorting and quality metrics
tools.detailed_description: UltraMegaSort2000 is a classic MATLAB toolbox for spike sorting and calculating quality metrics for extracellular spike data.

tools.name: element-array-ephys
tools.one_line_profile: DataJoint element for Neuropixels analysis
tools.detailed_description: A DataJoint Element designed for managing and analyzing Neuropixels data, integrating with Kilosort for spike sorting workflows.

tools.name: workflow-array-ephys
tools.one_line_profile: DataJoint workflow for Neuropixels analysis
tools.detailed_description: An example DataJoint workflow implementation for Neuropixels analysis using Kilosort, serving as a template for electrophysiology pipelines.

tools.name: neuropixel-utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for Neuropixel datasets and Kilosort results
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB utilities for managing Neuropixel datasets and processing Kilosort results.

tools.name: ViSAPy
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark data generator for spike sorting
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating synthetic benchmark data to evaluate and validate spike sorting methods.

tools.name: celestina
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for Wave_clus merge operations
tools.detailed_description: A graphical tool designed for the qualitative analysis and visualization of the merge operation within the Wave_clus spike sorting workflow.

tools.name: ironclust
tools.one_line_profile: Spike sorting software based on JRCLUST
tools.detailed_description: Spike sorting software developed at Flatiron Institute, based on the JRCLUST algorithm, optimized for drift correction and density-based clustering.

tools.name: mountainlab-js
tools.one_line_profile: Data processing and visualization framework for spike sorting
tools.detailed_description: MountainLab is a framework for data processing, sharing, and visualization, built around MountainSort but applicable to general scientific data pipelines.

tools.name: mountainsort
tools.one_line_profile: Fully automated spike sorting software
tools.detailed_description: MountainSort is a spike sorting software package known for its fully automated sorting capabilities using ISO-SPLIT clustering.

tools.name: mountainsort5
tools.one_line_profile: MountainSort spike sorting algorithm version 5
tools.detailed_description: The fifth version of the MountainSort spike sorting algorithm, implemented in Python for improved usability and integration.

tools.name: neuropixels-data-sep-2020
tools.one_line_profile: Example Neuropixels datasets for spike sorting development
tools.detailed_description: A collection of example Neuropixels datasets provided by Flatiron Institute for the purpose of developing and benchmarking spike sorting algorithms.

tools.name: spikeforest
tools.one_line_profile: Spike sorting benchmarking system
tools.detailed_description: SpikeForest is a comprehensive benchmarking system and website for evaluating the performance of various spike sorting algorithms against ground-truth datasets.

tools.name: spikeforest2
tools.one_line_profile: SpikeForest benchmarking analysis version 2
tools.detailed_description: Version 2 of the SpikeForest analysis pipeline for spike sorting benchmarking.

tools.name: spikeforest_old
tools.one_line_profile: Legacy SpikeForest benchmarking code
tools.detailed_description: Previous version of the SpikeForest benchmarking system code.

tools.name: spikes_localization_registration
tools.one_line_profile: Spike sorting and localization utilities from IBL
tools.detailed_description: Utilities for spike sorting, localization, and registration developed by the International Brain Laboratory (IBL).

tools.name: J_Clust
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB-based spike-sorting package for extracellular recordings
tools.detailed_description: A complete software package for spike sorting of extracellular electrode and tetrode recordings, featuring clustering algorithms and manual curation tools.

tools.name: Combinato
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic spike sorting and cluster visualization framework
tools.detailed_description: A complete spike sorting pipeline that includes artifact rejection, automatic clustering, and a graphical user interface for manual refinement and visualization of clusters.

tools.name: SHYBRID
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating hybrid ground-truth spiking data
tools.detailed_description: A graphical tool designed to generate hybrid ground-truth extracellular electrophysiology data, allowing for the quantitative evaluation and validation of spike sorting performance.

tools.name: KlustaKwik
tools.one_line_profile: Legacy automatic clustering software for spike sorting
tools.detailed_description: An older C++ implementation of the KlustaKwik clustering algorithm for high-dimensional data, primarily used in spike sorting pipelines (superseded by Klusta).

tools.name: KlustaViewa
tools.one_line_profile: Legacy graphical interface for manual spike sorting
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface designed for the manual stage of spike sorting, allowing users to inspect and refine clusters generated by automatic algorithms.

tools.name: SpikeDetekt
tools.one_line_profile: Spike detection algorithm for dense electrode arrays
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting spikes in extracellular recordings from large, dense electrode arrays, serving as the initial stage in the Klusta spike sorting suite.

tools.name: MoDT
tools.one_line_profile: Mixture of Drifting t-distributions model for spike sorting
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the Mixture of Drifting t-distributions model, designed to sort spikes and measure unit isolation in the presence of electrode drift.

tools.name: Klusta
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic spike sorting package for high-channel counts
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for automatic spike sorting of electrophysiological data from up to 64 channels, integrating spike detection and clustering.

tools.name: KlustaKwik2
tools.one_line_profile: High-dimensional cluster analysis using masked EM algorithm
tools.detailed_description: An optimized version of the KlustaKwik algorithm for high-dimensional clustering of spike data, utilizing a masked Expectation-Maximization algorithm for Gaussian mixtures.

tools.name: YASS (Genomics)
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic alignment similarity search tool
tools.detailed_description: A DNA local alignment tool designed to find potential similarity regions in DNA sequences, similar to BLAST but optimized for specific tasks.

tools.name: NeuroPyxels
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for processing Neuropixels data
tools.detailed_description: A library for loading, processing, and plotting electrophysiological data from Neuropixels probes, providing an alternative to MATLAB-based workflows.

tools.name: MountainSort v4 Algorithm
tools.one_line_profile: Core implementation of MountainSort v4 algorithm
tools.detailed_description: The core algorithmic implementation of MountainSort v4, a spike sorting software, designed to be used within the MountainLab framework.

tools.name: MountainLab
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for spike sorting and scientific data processing
tools.detailed_description: A framework for scientific data processing, primarily focused on reproducible spike sorting workflows and plugin management.

tools.name: MountainSort4
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for MountainSort4 spike sorting
tools.detailed_description: The Python package for MountainSort4, providing an interface to the MountainSort spike sorting algorithm.

tools.name: SortingView
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based visualization for spike sorting results
tools.detailed_description: A web application and Python library for visualizing and curating the results of electrophysiological spike sorting.

tools.name: SpikeTrainCommunitiesToolBox
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for spike-train community detection
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for detecting communities (assemblies) in neural spike train data, useful for analyzing population activity.

tools.name: QuickSpikes
tools.one_line_profile: Fast spike detection and extraction library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for fast detection and extraction of spikes from neural recordings, optimized for performance.

tools.name: YASS
tools.one_line_profile: Spike sorting algorithm designed for handling time-varying firing rates and electrode drift
tools.detailed_description: YASS (Yet Another Spike Sorter) is a spike sorting pipeline that handles electrode drift and time-varying firing rates using a neural network-based detection and denoising approach.

tools.name: BinaryPursuitSpikeSorting
tools.one_line_profile: Spike sorting algorithm using Binary Pursuit for synchronous and overlapped spikes
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the Binary Pursuit algorithm (Pillow et al., 2013) for detecting synchronous and overlapped spikes in extracellular recordings.

tools.name: ROSS
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Offline Spike Sorter for extracellular recordings
tools.detailed_description: ROSS (Robust Offline Spike Sorter) is a Python-based tool designed for spike sorting in electrophysiology, focusing on robustness in offline analysis.

tools.name: mksort
tools.one_line_profile: Spike sorting utility for Ripple Neuro electrophysiology data
tools.detailed_description: A spike sorting tool developed by Ripple Neuro for processing electrophysiology data, specifically designed to work with their data formats.

tools.name: Spyke
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and navigation tool for high-density spike sorting
tools.detailed_description: Spyke is a Python application designed for visualizing, navigating, and performing spike sorting on high-density multichannel neuronal extracellular waveform data.

tools.name: SpyKING CIRCUS
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable spike sorting algorithm for large-scale extracellular recordings
tools.detailed_description: SpyKING CIRCUS is a fast and scalable spike sorting solution based on template matching, designed to handle large-scale recordings from thousands of channels.

tools.name: SpyKING CIRCUS ORT
tools.one_line_profile: Offline Real-Time implementation of SpyKING CIRCUS
tools.detailed_description: An offline real-time (ORT) implementation of the SpyKING CIRCUS spike sorting algorithm, enabling stream-like processing of electrophysiological data.

tools.name: Tridesclous
tools.one_line_profile: Offline and online spike sorting toolkit
tools.detailed_description: Tridesclous is a spike sorting toolkit that provides methods for both offline and online sorting, featuring template matching and clustering algorithms.
